alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Southern Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:05PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson and southwestern Orange Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 204 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Central Gardens, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Port Arthur, Nederland, Groves, Port Neches, Bridge City, Central Gardens, Port Acres and Southeast Texas Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
